hints.content: The $\goldD{A}$ is at $\redD9{:}{\blueD{36}}$ because it is located $\blueD{36}$ ticks from $\redD9{:}{00}$.

On a clock, $\redD9{:}{00} $ looks like this:



[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A clock with every hour labeled and tick marks every 1 minute with the short hand on the 9 and the long hand on the 12. !

hints.content:
And just like the number line in the question, $9{:}{\blueD{36}}$ is $\blueD{36}$ ticks from $9{:}{00}.$



[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A clock with every hour labeled with the minutes it represents as follows: 0 minutes is at the 12, 5 minutes is at the 1, 10 minutes is at the 2, 15 minutes is at the 3, 20 minutes is at the 4, 25 minutes is at the 5, 30 minutes is at the 6, 35 minutes is at the 7, 40 minutes is at the 8, 45 minutes is at the 9, 50 minutes is at the 10, and 55 minutes is at the 11. Tick marks are also shown every 1 minute. The short hand is between the 9 and 10 and the long hand is on the first tick mark after the 7. A line extends through the long hand to further show that the long hand is on the first tick mark after 35. !
A clock with every hour labeled and tick marks every 1 minute, showing the short hand between the 9 and 10 and the long hand on the first tick mark after the 7. !

question.content:
**Which clock matches the time shown on the number line?**

[[☃ image 1]]

[[☃ radio 1]]

options.alt: A number line labeled 9:00 to 10:00 with tick marks at every one-minute unit. The tick mark at 9:36 unit is labeled A. !

choices.content: ![A clock with every hour labeled and tick marks every 1 minute, showing the short hand between the 9 and 10 and the long hand on the first tick mark after the 6.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/e74511a4fa12c475d7d9263bffea10e89e710c2e)

![A clock with every hour labeled and tick marks every 1 minute, showing the short hand between the 9 and 10 and the long hand on the first tick mark after the 7.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/ab16c5bb1321fa0c2f4f68895af8bf971a1c5671)

![A clock with every hour labeled and tick marks every 1 minute, showing the short hand between the 10 and 11 and the long hand on the first tick mark after the 7.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/61e7e6baf37c63c4133959df67c61ad6168029e0)
